title: drSTi ninna
sahitya:
drSTi ninna pAdadalli nODo hAge dhare duSTa jana sangagaLa biDO hAge


caraNam 1    keTTa mAtu kiviyinda kELadhAge mana kaTTi sadA ninna dhyAna biDada hAge
    caraNam 2    diTTanAgi kaiyanetti koDo hAge shrI krSNa ninna pUjeyanu mADO hAge 
bhraSTanAgi nAlvaroLu tirugadhAge balu shiSTa jana sEveyanu mADO hAge
    caraNam 3    puTTisida tAyi tandEyallo nInu ondu hoTTrgAgi dainyapaDa bEke nAnu 
paTTe paTTAvaLi bEDalilla nAnu enna guTTu abhimAnagaLa kAyo nInu
    caraNam 4    naTTa nIroLage IsalarO nAnu etti kaTTe sErisa bEkayyA nInu 
beTTadantha pApa hottiruve nAnu ada suTTu biDu purandara viTTala nInu
